extends java.lang.Object

      WindowPatternCard(java.lang.String name, int rows, int columns)

      • existsAdjacentDice

        public boolean existsAdjacentDice(Dice[] adjacentDices)
        method used by checkPos
        Parameters:
        adjacentDices - is an array of dices we want to check
        Returns:
        true if at least one of the dices in adjacentDices is not null, false otherwise

      • checkPos

        public boolean checkPos(Dice d,
                        int row,
                        int column)
        This method checks if there's at least one adjacent dice to the position where we want to place a new dice, it also checks that the ortogonally adjacent dices have a different color and value compared to the new dice
        Parameters:
        d - is the new dice we want to place
        row - is the row of the position of the new dice
        column - is the column of the position of the new dice
        Returns:
        true if there's at least one adjacent dice to the chosen position and it has a different color and value compared to the dice d, false otherwise

      • putDice

        public boolean putDice(Dice d,
                       int row,
                       int column)
        If all the conditions are satisfied, it places the dice d in the chosen position
        Parameters:
        d - the dice to place
        row - the row of the chosen position
        column - the column of the chosen position
        Returns:
        true if the dice is placed correctly, false otherwise

      • putDiceBack

        public void putDiceBack(Dice d,
                        int row,
                        int column)
        Used when after a wrong usage of a toolcard the player has to put the dice back to its original position
        Parameters:
        d - the dice to put back
        row - the row index of the original position of the dice
        column - the column index of the original position of the dice

      • putDiceIgnoringValueConstraint

        public void putDiceIgnoringValueConstraint(Dice d,
                                           int row,
                                           int column)
        places a new dice d without checking the eventual value constraint of the chosen position
        Parameters:

        row - is the row of the chosen position
        column - is the column of the chosen position

      • putFirstDice

        public boolean putFirstDice(Dice d,
                            int row,
                            int column)
        Places the first dice in the scheme card, it has to be placed on a slot in the borders of the scheme card, it has to satisfy the square color or value constraints
        Parameters:
        d - is the new dice to place
        row - is the index of the row of the chosen position
        column - is the index of the column of the chosen position
        Returns:
        true if the dice is placed correctly, false otherwise.

      • putDiceWithoutCheckPos

        public void putDiceWithoutCheckPos(Dice d,
                                   int row,
                                   int column)
        Places a dice without checking if it would be adjacent to an existing one or to one with the same color or value
        Parameters:
        d - is the new dice to place
        row - is the index of the row of the chosen position
        column - is the index of the column of the chosen position

      • removeDice

        public Dice removeDice(int row,
                       int column)
        Removes a dice from a chosen position
        Parameters:
        row - is the index of the row of the chosen position
        column - is the index of the column of the chosen position
        Returns:
        the removed dice if present, null if the square in the chosen position is empty

      • getDice

        public Dice getDice(int row,
                    int column)
        Returns the dice from the chosen position, without removing it
        Parameters:
        row - is the index of the row of the chosen position
        column - is the index of the column of the chosen position
        Returns:
        the dice from the chosen position, if present, null if the square in the chosen position is empty
